item.description:
DINNER WITH FRIENDS is a play about two long term couples, after 1 of them gets divorced... Players is a theater group which has members on NBC, etc. Good theater. In the round. Need pre-payment so I can have the tickets saved for us. Been a member here for 20+ yrs, Tickets are $25 and worth it.

 

send me your full name and a check for 25.00 to patrick clark, 89 Davis Ave, Cranston RI 02910.  the sooner i get it, the quicker i can reserve you a ticket.  it fills quickly, as the current member will attest to.
item.name: See "DINNER WITH FRIENDS" @ PLAYERS THEATER CLUB
